com.plexobject.http.netty

Class NettyWebRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<java.lang.Object>
          • com.plexobject.http.netty.NettyWebRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public class NettyWebRequestHandler
extends io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<java.lang.Object>
    This class handles requests over http and websockets using Netty container For Websockets following are supported
    • Safari 5+ (draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-00)
    • Chrome 6-13 (draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-00)
    • Chrome 14+ (draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-10)
    • Chrome 16+ (RFC 6455 aka draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-17)
    • Firefox 7+ (draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-10)
    • Firefox 11+ (RFC 6455 aka draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-17)
